title: EDORAS UNDER SIEGE - Third Age Total War Gameplay
description:
Third Age Total War Gameplay - Edoras is under siege! An alliance of Rhun, Isengard, and Gondor are at the gates.  Defending the city we have the Silvan Elves and Dale (Because Rohan went on Holiday).  The fate of Edoras will be decided now!  Enjoy the battle!
 
If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
